caption: In the jungle, there is a woman surrounded by many chipmunks and a man wearing white feathered clothing and a pair of glasses meets another man in dark attire by the river, and they chat by the riverbank. Night falls, and the chipmunks curl up in leaves to sleep. The following morning, the chipmunks wake up and start roaming the jungle. One of the chipmunks hangs upside down. The woman sits on a tree branch, and the chipmunks climb the tree. One chipmunk falls from the tree upside down. The chipmunks begin to dance in a clearing in the forest.
